channel.title: Comments on: WordPress 2.9 – XML-RPC and AtomPub Changes

item.title: By: Sun Weblog Publisher on Wordpress 2.9 | 3DN

item.description: [...] I upgraded my Wordpress server to version 2.9. I read the ChangeLog for Wordpress 2.9 and noticed there were some XML-RPC improvements. Since I’m using XML-RPC [...]
